name: Dunkopoly
description:
A slam dunk, or dunk, is one of the most decisive, efficient, and crowd-pleasing types of basketball shots. Dunkopoly (Dunk - opoly) is a property trading board game that celebrates the game of basketball and it's most exciting shot, the "dunk". Buy, Sell, and Trade some of the world's most famous basketball dunkers and dunk styles while learning about the fantastic history of the "Slam Dunk". Download and play Dunkopoly today!


Game Features:

* 2D/2.5D/3D play modes
* Increase or decrease the amount of money played in the game
* Optional Game Features:
* Customize your player cards
* Change player names
